ValidationRule.description: Static Resource, Resource URL, and URL must be left blank if the Image Type is selected as None on the product Image record.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( Type__c , 'None') && NOT( ISBLANK( Resource__c ) && ISBLANK( Resource__c ) && ISBLANK( URL__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Static Resource, Resource URL, and URL must be left blank if the Image Type is selected as None
